channel.title: Cammypvp
channel.description:
Impunity is a new Forever pk/luzox remake. with a alot of features.
•24/7 Active Pking, Skilling & PVM community. •Active Forums. •Weekly updates •Excellent Staff •Multiple Daily Server Events including Free For Alls, Hide and Seeks, and More! •Starter pack & instant PKING •Stable economy •Special benefits for donators and diffrent ranks. •Vote Shop •Dragon Defender/ TokHaar-Kal Cape •Every Chaotic / Pvp item •Pk point system •Target System •Bakriminel Bolts •Dragon Bolts •Diamond Bolts •Vengeance • Saradomin Sword Special Attack •Granite Maul Special Attack •Dragonfire Shield operate •Shadow-silk hood •Void Ranged bonus •Void Mage bonus •Magic potion damage boost •Arcane stream/Staff of light/etc magic boost •Correct formulas •Correct Divine and Elysian effects •Clean bank interface with deposit button. •Proper packet handling (None of that instant switch that causes dcs shit) •Crisp new shop interface •All text refurbished. No more broken english all over the place. •Item/NPC rarity/special colors given a new refreshing look. •New message box system to display pkpoints gained/kill feed info/whatever the f**k you want. •Better data sending and fixed unhandled packets meaning absolutely zero T1 and T2 errors as well as freezes. •Enter to login •Scrolling on interfaces •& Morewebsite: impunity.comli.com forums: impunity.comli.com/forums/ client: https://www.dropbox.com/s/1k4df8h7cdep29z/impunity.jar?dl=0
Join Now! Brand new community! join!!!!!

item.description:
@sbruinsma77 wrote:

Impunity is a new Forever pk/luzox remake.
with a alot of features.

•24/7 Active Pking, Skilling & PVM community.
•Active Forums.
•Weekly updates
•Excellent Staff
•Multiple Daily Server Events including Free For Alls, Hide and Seeks, and More!
•Starter pack & instant PKING
•Stable economy
•Special benefits for donators and diffrent ranks.
•Vote Shop
•Dragon Defender/ TokHaar-Kal Cape
•Every Chaotic / Pvp item
•Pk point system
•Target System
•Bakriminel Bolts
•Dragon Bolts
•Diamond Bolts

•Correct formulas
•Correct Divine and Elysian effects
•Clean bank interface with deposit button.
•Proper packet handling (None of that instant switch that causes dcs shit)
•Crisp new shop interface
•All text refurbished. No more broken english all over the place.
•Item/NPC rarity/special colors given a new refreshing look.
•New message box system to display pkpoints gained/kill feed info/whatever the f**k you want.
•Better data sending and fixed unhandled packets meaning absolutely zero T1 and T2 errors as well as freezes.
•Enter to login
•Scrolling on interfaces
